items.text: half tracker and put away without much fuss. Uses the width to slap this off the backfoot to the cover fence
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: squeezes this full delivery back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: worked with the spin to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: drifts in, he looks to drive, this rolls off an inside edge to short midwicket.
items.postText: It's time for drinks. Bangladesh have consolidated after a slow start. Now for these two to convert their starts into three figures.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: defends this from the crease
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fired full, just outside off, he plays inside the line as he watches this to the keeper.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: defends this full delivery with the bat well in front of the pad. Sharp turn.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this to deep cover for an easy single
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and cuts, straight to point.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: eased with the spin to long-off.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: works this off his pads to square leg.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: zips through to hit him high on the left pad as he plays across the line
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: driven through the line to long-off.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: skids one across, he dabs this into the off side for a quick single
items.postText: Manan: "Give the ball over to Gayle, the ball is turning a mile for the spinners and bishoo hasn't been able to do anything in his one over. BD might relax a bit and lose focus if Gayle comes on.."
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: eased with the spin to midwicket, good stop.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tucks this wide of square leg, will keep strike.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, defended with soft hands.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: sharp turn as he dabs this outside edge to short third man
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: swept fiercely into the gap at deep backward square leg, superb work by Rovman Powell. Covered ground, ran to his left and fired a rocket throw.
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: goes back and across as he punches this to cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: steps out and launches this over long-on. First six of the game. Lovely as well. Got right to the pitch and looked to hit it straight, which was the key.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

items.text: mistimes a drive to cover.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: drifts into middle and leg, looks to work this to the leg side, hit on the pad
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: bunted into the leg side for a quick single.
items.shortText: Bishoo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
